title: ICAI Revises Industrial Training Empanelment Criteria
content:
# ICAI Revises Industrial Training Empanelment Criteria

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne industrial training impart karne ke liye organizations ke empanelment criteria mein changes announce kiye hain. Yeh revised norms January 1, 2026, se effective honge.

Here’s a quick lowdown on the key revisions:

*   **Effective Date:** The revised eligibility criteria are effective from January 1, 2026.
*   **Announcement Date:** ICAI published this announcement on January 12, 2026.
*   **Revised Financial Conditions (Regulation 51(2)(b)):** To be eligible for empanelment, financial, commercial, or industrial undertakings ko ab inmein se koi ek financial condition fulfill karni hogi:
    *   Minimum Fixed Assets: ₹10 crore.
    *   Minimum Total Turnover: ₹50 crore.
    *   Minimum Paid-up Share Capital: ₹1 crore, along with a Net Worth of ₹5 crore (yeh dono jointly fulfill karne honge).
*   **Chartered Accountant Requirement:** Organizations mein kam se kam do full-time working Chartered Accountants hone chahiye. Har CA ko ICAI ka member continuously teen saal ke liye hona zaroori hai.

Yeh revisions Regulation 51(2)(b) of the Chartered Accountants Regulations, 1988 ke under kiye gaye hain.
